verses.verse: Let me <S%H7891>sing<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> for my <S%H1730>well-beloved<s%> A <S%H9598>song<s%> of my beloved concerning His <S%H3754>vineyard.<s%> My well-beloved <S%H1961>had<s%> a <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> on a <S%H1121>fertile<s%> <S%H8081><s%> <S%H7161>hill.<s%>

And He <S%H5823>dug<s%> it all <S%H5823>around,<s%> <S%H5619>removed<s%> its <S%H5619>stones,<s%> And <S%H5193>planted<s%> it with the <S%H8321>choicest<s%> <S%H8321>vine.<s%> And He <S%H1129>built<s%> a <S%H4026>tower<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of it, And <S%H2672>hewed<s%> out a <S%H3342>wine<s%> <S%H3342>vat<s%> in it; Then He <S%H6960>expected<s%> [it] to <S%H6213>produce<s%> [good] <S%H6025>grapes,<s%> But it <S%H6213>produced<s%> [only] <S%H891>worthless<s%> <S%H891>ones.<s%>
"And <S%H6258>now,<s%> O <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H8199>Judge<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> Me and My <S%H3754>vineyard.<s%>

<S%H4100>"What<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> was there to <S%H6213>do<s%> for My <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> that I have not <S%H6213>done<s%> in it? <S%H4069>Why,<s%> when I <S%H6960>expected<s%> [it] to <S%H6213>produce<s%> [good] <S%H6025>grapes<s%> did it <S%H6213>produce<s%> <S%H891>worthless<s%> <S%H891>ones<s%>?

"So <S%H6258>now<s%> let Me <S%H3045>tell<s%> you <S%H834>what<s%> I am going to <S%H6213>do<s%> to My <S%H3754>vineyard:<s%> I will <S%H5493>remove<s%> its <S%H9299>hedge<s%> and it will be <S%H1197>consumed;<s%> I will <S%H6555>break<s%> <S%H6555>down<s%> its <S%H1447>wall<s%> and it will <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H4823>trampled<s%> <S%H4823>ground.<s%>

"And I will <S%H7896>lay<s%> it <S%H1326>waste;<s%> It will not be <S%H2168>pruned<s%> or <S%H9386>hoed,<s%> But <S%H8068>briars<s%> and <S%H7898>thorns<s%> will <S%H5927>come<s%> up. I will also <S%H6680>charge<s%> the <S%H5645>clouds<s%> to <S%H4305>rain<s%> <S%H4480>no<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> on it."

For the <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> And the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> His <S%H8191>delightful<s%> <S%H5194>plant.<s%> Thus He <S%H6960>looked<s%> for <S%H4941>justice,<s%> but <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H4939>bloodshed;<s%> For <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> but <S%H2009>behold,<s%> a <S%H6818>cry<s%> of <S%H6818>distress.<s%>

<S%H1945>Woe<s%> to those who <S%H5060>add<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H1004>house<s%> [and] <S%H7126>join<s%> <S%H7704>field<s%> to <S%H7704>field,<s%> <S%H5704>Until<s%> there is <S%H657>no<s%> <S%H657>more<s%> <S%H4725>room,<s%> So that you have to <S%H3427>live<s%> <S%H905>alone<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>land!<s%>

In my <S%H241>ears<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> [has sworn,] <S%H518>"Surely,<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%> shall <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H8047>desolate,<s%> [Even] <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H2896>fine<s%> <S%H2896>ones,<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H3427>occupants.<s%>

"For <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H6776>acres<s%> of <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> will <S%H6213>yield<s%> [only] <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1324>bath<s%> [of wine,] And a <S%H9149>homer<s%> of <S%H2233>seed<s%> will <S%H6213>yield<s%> [but] an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of grain."

<S%H1945>Woe<s%> to those who <S%H7925>rise<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> that they may <S%H7291>pursue<s%> <S%H7941>strong<s%> <S%H7941>drink;<s%> Who <S%H309>stay<s%> up <S%H309>late<s%> in the <S%H5399>evening<s%> that <S%H3196>wine<s%> may <S%H1814>inflame<s%> them!

And their <S%H4960>banquets<s%> are [accompanied] by <S%H3658>lyre<s%> and <S%H5035>harp,<s%> by <S%H8596>tambourine<s%> and <S%H2485>flute,<s%> and by <S%H3196>wine;<s%> But they do not <S%H5027>pay<s%> <S%H5027>attention<s%> to the <S%H6467>deeds<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> do they <S%H7200>consider<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of His <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1540>go<s%> into <S%H1540>exile<s%> for their <S%H1097>lack<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge;<s%> And their <S%H9202>honorable<s%> <S%H4962>men<s%> are <S%H7458>famished,<s%> And their <S%H1995>multitude<s%> is <S%H6704>parched<s%> with <S%H6772>thirst.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> has <S%H7337>enlarged<s%> its <S%H5315>throat<s%> and <S%H6473>opened<s%> its <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H2706>measure;<s%> And Jerusalem's <S%H1926>splendor,<s%> her <S%H1995>multitude,<s%> her <S%H7588>din<s%> [of revelry,] and the <S%H5938>jubilant<s%> within her, <S%H3381>descend<s%> [into it.]

So the [common] <S%H120>man<s%> will be <S%H7817>humbled,<s%> and the <S%H376>man<s%> of [importance] <S%H8213>abased,<s%> The <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H1364>proud<s%> also will be <S%H8213>abased.<s%>

But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> will be <S%H1361>exalted<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> And the <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> will <S%H6942>show<s%> Himself <S%H6942>holy<s%> in <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

Then the <S%H3532>lambs<s%> will <S%H7462>graze<s%> as in their <S%H1699>pasture,<s%> And <S%H1481>strangers<s%> will <S%H398>eat<s%> in the <S%H2723>waste<s%> <S%H2723>places<s%> of the <S%H4220>wealthy.<s%>
<S%H1945>Woe<s%> to those who <S%H4900>drag<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> with the <S%H9112>cords<s%> of <S%H7723>falsehood,<s%> And <S%H2403>sin<s%> as if with <S%H5699>cart<s%> <S%H5688>ropes;<s%>

Who <S%H559>say,<s%> "Let Him <S%H4116>make<s%> <S%H4116>speed,<s%> let Him <S%H2363>hasten<s%> His <S%H4639>work,<s%> that we may <S%H7200>see<s%> [it;] And let the <S%H6098>purpose<s%> of the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7126>draw<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> And <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H935>pass,<s%> that we may <S%H3045>know<s%> [it!]"

<S%H1945>Woe<s%> to those who <S%H559>call<s%> <S%H9563>evil<s%> <S%H9185>good,<s%> and <S%H9185>good<s%> <S%H9563>evil;<s%> Who <S%H7760>substitute<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%> for <S%H216>light<s%> and <S%H216>light<s%> for <S%H2822>darkness;<s%> Who <S%H7760>substitute<s%> <S%H4751>bitter<s%> for <S%H4966>sweet,<s%> and <S%H4966>sweet<s%> for <S%H4751>bitter!<s%>
<S%H1945>Woe<s%> to those <S%H2450>who<s%> are <S%H2450>wise<s%> in their own <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> And <S%H995>clever<s%> in their own <S%H5048>sight<s%><S%H6440>!<s%>

<S%H1945>Woe<s%> to those who are <S%H1368>heroes<s%> in <S%H8354>drinking<s%> <S%H3196>wine,<s%> And <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> in <S%H4537>mixing<s%> <S%H7941>strong<s%> <S%H7941>drink;<s%>
Who <S%H6663>justify<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> for a <S%H7810>bribe,<s%> And <S%H5493>take<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H6666>rights<s%> of the ones <S%H6662>who<s%> are in the <S%H6662>right!<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore,<s%> as a <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H398>consumes<s%> <S%H7179>stubble,<s%> And <S%H2842>dry<s%> <S%H2842>grass<s%> <S%H7503>collapses<s%> into the <S%H3852>flame,<s%> So their <S%H8328>root<s%> will <S%H1961>become<s%> like <S%H4716>rot<s%> and their <S%H6525>blossom<s%> <S%H5927>blow<s%> <S%H5927>away<s%> as <S%H80>dust;<s%> For they have <S%H3988>rejected<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> And <S%H5006>despised<s%> the <S%H565>word<s%> of the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

On <S%H3651>this<s%> <S%H3651>account<s%> the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H2734>burned<s%> against His <S%H5971>people,<s%> And He has <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out His <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them and <S%H5221>struck<s%> them <S%H5221>down,<s%> And the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H7264>quaked;<s%> and their <S%H5038>corpses<s%> <S%H1961>lay<s%> like <S%H5478>refuse<s%> in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of the <S%H2351>streets.<s%> For <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H384>this<s%> His <S%H639>anger<s%> is not <S%H7725>spent,<s%> But His <S%H3027>hand<s%> is <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out.

He will also <S%H5375>lift<s%> up a <S%H5251>standard<s%> to the <S%H7350>distant<s%> <S%H1471>nation,<s%> And will <S%H8319>whistle<s%> for it from the <S%H7097>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> And <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it will <S%H935>come<s%> with <S%H4120>speed<s%> <S%H7031>swiftly.<s%>

<S%H369>No<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> in it is <S%H5889>weary<s%> or <S%H3782>stumbles,<s%> <S%H3808>None<s%> <S%H5123>slumbers<s%> or <S%H3462>sleeps;<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> is the <S%H232>belt<s%> at its <S%H2504>waist<s%> <S%H6605>undone,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> its <S%H5275>sandal<s%> <S%H8288>strap<s%> <S%H5423>broken.<s%>

Its <S%H2671>arrows<s%> are <S%H8150>sharp,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H7198>bows<s%> are <S%H1869>bent;<s%> The <S%H6541>hoofs<s%> of its <S%H5483>horses<s%> <S%H2803>seem<s%> like <S%H9497>flint,<s%> and its [chariot] <S%H1534>wheels<s%> like a <S%H5492>whirlwind.<s%>

Its <S%H7581>roaring<s%> is like a <S%H3833>lioness,<s%> and it <S%H7580>roars<s%> like <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H3715>lions;<s%> It <S%H5098>growls<s%> as it <S%H270>seizes<s%> the <S%H2964>prey,<s%> And <S%H6403>carries<s%> [it] <S%H6403>off<s%> with <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> [it.]

And it shall <S%H5098>growl<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> it in that <S%H3117>day<s%> like the <S%H5100>roaring<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%> If one <S%H5027>looks<s%> to the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there is <S%H2822>darkness<s%> [and] <S%H9496>distress;<s%> Even the <S%H216>light<s%> is <S%H2821>darkened<s%> by its <S%H6183>clouds.<s%>
